rmiNodeCore

Interface SiteItf

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiteImpl

    public interface SiteItf
extends java.rmi.Remote
    is an interface defining default methods for RMI node
    Author:
    Douaille Erwan & Demol David
